```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
require(ggplot)
require(leaflet)
require(knitr)
```


# Different banks who provide ATM services in the Stavanger area and the amount of ATMs
```{r data_get}
minibank <- read.csv("../data/cuserssk5017717downloadsminibankerstavanger.csv")


plot(minibank$bank, main="Oversikt",
  xlab="Hvilken type bank", ylab="Antall minibanker")

```

## Locations of ATMs in the Stavanger municipality

```{r}
m <- leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%  
  addMarkers(lng=c(minibank[,4]), lat=c(minibank[,3]), popup="Stavanger ATM locations")
m 
```
